Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp6.persistency

Class Logging

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp6.persistency.Logging
public final class Logging extends Object
This utility class is responsible for saving and loading logs.
